I think theres a misunderstand here, those people you called exception are the group that classified to have the illness. The problem is even in the face of starvation (or any of those stimulation that trigger survival instinct) those who has mental illness doesn't respond to it properly... The line is blurry and only become clear in such extremity, that's why diagnostics have to be taken carefully in consideration.

Its a beautiful and complex topic, heart breaking to see that media makes it really confusing and hard to approach for normal people like you and me.
